# Requesty

Use `requesty/<model>` with VoltAgent's model router.

## Quick start

```ts
import { Agent } from "@voltagent/core";

const agent = new Agent({
  name: "requesty-agent",
  instructions: "You are a helpful assistant",
  model: "requesty/anthropic/claude-3-7-sonnet",
});
```

## Environment variables

- `REQUESTY_API_KEY`

## Provider package

`@ai-sdk/openai-compatible`

This provider uses the OpenAI-compatible adapter.

## Default base URL

`https://router.requesty.ai/v1`

You can override the base URL by setting `REQUESTY_BASE_URL`.

## Provider docs

- https://requesty.ai/solution/llm-routing/models
